rows.label: qev035701_MSG0001
rows.name:
Greetings, Earth alien. I hope you tore apart many
Ganglion since we last spoke.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev035701_JNK0010
rows.name: Boast

rows.label: qev035701_SEL0011
rows.name: Say that you lost count of how many you have killed.

rows.label: qev035701_JNK0020
rows.name: Chide

rows.label: qev035701_SEL0021
rows.name: Lecture Slovity about her love of needless killing.

rows.label: qev035701_MSG0002
rows.name:
That is much apart-tearing! But you are skilled warrior.
I expect no less.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev035701_MSG0003
rows.name:
My team is also on warpath. We roam Mira.
Claim Ganglion heads at every turn.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev035701_MSG0004
rows.name: Er, this is Earth-alien humor? Joke?[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev035701_MSG0005
rows.name:
Bah! While you tell bad joke, my team is busy.
We roam Mira. Claim Ganglion heads at every turn.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev035701_MSG0006
rows.name:
We achieved great victory in Cauldros.
Shame [ST:playername ] was not there to
see it, eh, Trigo?[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev035701_MSG0007
rows.name:
That was not great victory. That was suicide.
You charged enemy alone. Did not wait for backup.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev035701_MSG0008
rows.name:
Ha ha ha! You worry like new mother!
I would never fall to such weaklings.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev035701_MSG0009
rows.name:
Enough. What of info we found on their boss?
Are you done examining it?[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev035701_MSG0010
rows.name:
Yes. Many soldiers are heading to that area.
Gathering in holds and fortresses.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev035701_MSG0011
rows.name: We will plan attack. Over coming weeks, weâ€”[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev035701_MSG0012
rows.name:
Bah! We have [ST:playername ].
[ST:gender p1=He p2=She ] and I storm holds ourselves.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev035701_MSG0013
rows.name: What? Madness![ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev035701_MSG0014
rows.name:
Yes. I cannot wait! I have wanted to rampage
with this Earth alien for some time![ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev035701_MSG0015
rows.name: You are both mad.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev035701_MSG0016
rows.name: If you must go, Captain, prepare first.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev035701_MSG0017
rows.name:
We must strike quickly. Like wolfen.
You lot prepare for next battle in meantime.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev035701_MSG0018
rows.name:
Come, Earth alien. We meet in front of Lotus Keep
building site.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev035701_MSG0019
rows.name:
They gave us cursed gear. Controlled my team.
Injured me. They will pay in blood![ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev035701_MSG0026
rows.name:
This hold will do to start.
Have you ever stormed one?[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev035701_JNK0030
rows.name: Boast

rows.label: qev035701_SEL0031
rows.name: Claim that you crushed all within like bugs.

rows.label: qev035701_JNK0040
rows.name: Downplay

rows.label: qev035701_SEL0041
rows.name: Wince and say that it was a difficult fight.

rows.label: qev035701_MSG0027
rows.name:
Then you need no explanation from me.
I will say only this...[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev035701_MSG0028
rows.name: I would like to meet ones who challenged you.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev035701_MSG0029
rows.name: But let me offer tip on storming holds.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev035701_MSG0030
rows.name:
Most Ganglion fortresses are controlled by captain
and vice-captain.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev035701_MSG0031
rows.name: Kill both in one pass, and chain of command falls.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev035701_MSG0032
rows.name: So I have proposition for you.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev035701_MSG0033
rows.name: I kill one of them. You kill other.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev035701_MSG0034
rows.name: Whoever has fastest time wins![ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev035701_MSG0035
rows.name:
Heh heh! Fun, yes?
Now we will know which of us is greater warrior.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev035701_JNK0130
rows.name: Accept

rows.label: qev035701_SEL0131
rows.name: Take on Slovity's challenge.

rows.label: qev035701_JNK0140
rows.name: Decline

rows.label: qev035701_SEL0141
rows.name: Remind Slovity that this is not a game.

rows.label: qev035701_MSG0036
rows.name: Spoken like true Prone.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev035701_MSG0037
rows.name: Now let challenge begin![ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev035701_MSG0038
rows.name:
You are crazy! Nothing more fun than battle to death
with deserving scum.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev035701_MSG0039
rows.name:
Do not be kitten mewling for mother's milk.
Fight with me! Let contest begin![ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev035701_MSG0040
rows.name: I will strike hold first. You wait there.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev035701_MSG0041
rows.name:
Captain Slovity works fast.
Do not blink, or you will miss show.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev035701_MSG0042
rows.name: ...I broke captain in two![ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev035701_MSG0043
rows.name:
He struggled longer than expected. Five minutes.
Still not bad time![ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev035701_MSG0044
rows.name: Can you defeat vice-captain faster? We will see.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev035701_MSG0045
rows.name: Now, go! Tear him to shreds![ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev035701_MSG0046
rows.name: Go! Crush leader of stronghold faster than me![ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev035701_MSG0047
rows.name: You are great warrior. I expect victory.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev035701_MSG0048
rows.name: ...Back already? And vice-captain is dead?[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev035701_JNK0050
rows.name: Boast

rows.label: qev035701_SEL0051
rows.name: Tell Slovity that you were bored.

rows.label: qev035701_JNK0060
rows.name: Complain

rows.label: qev035701_SEL0061
rows.name: Say that it was hard going without Slovity's help.

rows.label: qev035701_MSG0049
rows.name: Heh. You beat my time.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev035701_MSG0050
rows.name: Says one who beat my time?[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev035701_MSG0051
rows.name:
You are strong. But pride never clouds your judgment.
You terrify me in good way.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev035701_MSG0052
rows.name: This round is yours.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev035701_MSG0053
rows.name: Now for rematch![ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev035701_MSG0054
rows.name: This time I take second-in-command. You crush captain.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev035701_MSG0055
rows.name: That is only fair.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev035701_MSG0056
rows.name:
I will go ahead. Begin scouting.
You follow. Do not keep me waiting![ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev035701_MSG0057
rows.name: Ah! Here at last.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev035701_MSG0058
rows.name: I scouted fortress. It will be tougher than last one.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev035701_MSG0059
rows.name: All more fun! Added flavor to spice up little race.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev035701_JNK0070
rows.name: Agree

rows.label: qev035701_SEL0071
rows.name: Grin and say that you can't wait.

rows.label: qev035701_JNK0080
rows.name: Disagree

rows.label: qev035701_SEL0081
rows.name: Mutter something about how taking lives is never fun.

rows.label: qev035701_MSG0060
rows.name: Then why wait? Let rampage begin![ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev035701_MSG0061
rows.name: I was right to invite you along. I smelled bloodlust.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev035701_MSG0062
rows.name:
What are you talking about? And why grim face?
Did you eat something bad?[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev035701_MSG0063
rows.name:
Your opinions are odd. Yet strength is mighty.
Still, I will have enough fun for both of us.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev035701_MSG0064
rows.name: Now to head inside. Crush vice-captain.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev035701_MSG0065
rows.name: I will be faster this time![ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev035701_MSG0066
rows.name: Ha! This time I have you beat.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev035701_MSG0067
rows.name: Three minutes. Top that![ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev035701_MSG0068
rows.name: I'll be here. You go tear captain limb from limb.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev035701_MSG0069
rows.name:
I took only three minutes.
Even for you, that should be challenging.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev035701_MSG0070
rows.name: Now, go! Destroy captain![ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev035701_MSG0071
rows.name: Your grin says job is done. And faster than me![ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev035701_MSG0072
rows.name:
Being beaten is...strange feeling. New feeling.
That would sting if I weren't having fun![ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev035701_MSG0073
rows.name:
I can take on anything with you. Topple any fortress.
Even Cavern Clan's Scabland Fortress![ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev035701_MSG0074
rows.name:
I had planned to end day here...
But this is too much fun to stop now![ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev035701_MSG0075
rows.name: One more stronghold! Let's do it![ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev035701_JNK0090
rows.name: Accept

rows.label: qev035701_SEL0091
rows.name: Pound your chest and flex your mighty muscles.

rows.label: qev035701_JNK0100
rows.name: Decline

rows.label: qev035701_SEL0101
rows.name: Say that you've had enough for one day.

rows.label: qev035701_MSG0076
rows.name:
You are best! I'll go ahead. You come after.
Do not keep me waiting.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev035701_MSG0077
rows.name: Hmph! I do not care.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev035701_MSG0078
rows.name:
We are doing this! I will go on ahead.
You come after. Do not make me wait.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev035701_MSG0079
rows.name: Earth alien! I was just scouting hold and found treat.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev035701_MSG0080
rows.name: It is Megisia! Woman who attacked us before![ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev035701_MSG0081
rows.name:
I am sure. Way of speaking. Infuriating attitude.
All just like voice I heard through gear![ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev035701_MSG0082
rows.name: But, did you not kill her?[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev035701_JNK0110
rows.name: Deduce

rows.label: qev035701_SEL0111
rows.name:
Tell Slovity that Megisia's body may
be artificial, like a mimeosome.

rows.label: qev035701_JNK0120
rows.name: Scoff

rows.label: qev035701_SEL0121
rows.name: Laugh and say that just means you get to kill her again.

rows.label: qev035701_MSG0083
rows.name: You are wise. That may be true.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev035701_MSG0084
rows.name:
So this time, we leave no scrap intact.
Then she never comes back![ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev035701_MSG0085
rows.name: This is true. Who cares about details?[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev035701_MSG0086
rows.name:
This time, we destroy her utterly.
Then she never comes back![ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev035701_MSG0087
rows.name: This will be my fastest time yet.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev035701_MSG0088
rows.name: Forgive me if I forget to leave any for you! Ha ha![ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev035701_MSG0089
rows.name:
So. You are [ST:playername ], then?
A friend to this fool, Slovity?[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev035701_MSG0090
rows.name:
I am the youngest sister in the Megisia series.
MG068: Megisia, to be exact.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev035701_MSG0091
rows.name:
I'm speaking to you through that insufferable Prone
woman's comm device.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev035701_MSG0092
rows.name:
Do you understand what this means? ...No?
Then let me spell it out for your little human brain.
Come to me now, or she dies.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev035701_MSG0093
rows.name:
Do hurry, little insect. You killed my sister, after all.
I would hate for you to be late to your own execution.[ST:wait ]
